column1: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.

RDS service increased to db.m5.8xlarge vCPU: 32 Memory: 128 GiB. Increased storage amount to 3 TB, backup storage amount to 2TB, Size of Backup Processed for Export amount to 10000 GB per day. It provides increased resilience and redundancy with its multi-region deployment.
Added Amazon CloudWatch, to collect various logs and notify me during any alarms.
